subject: Re: [junit] Re: Mock and collections.
msgSnippet: Ok, I found a easy solution for my problem, Even the code becomes more clear with this new approach. Soon I will send to you the new code. I will make a
messageBody:
Ok, I found a easy solution for my problem, Even the code becomes more clear
with this new approach. Soon I will send to you the new code. I will make a
article about this too.

Thanks. :)

2006/11/20, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains762@...>:
